resources.string:
Habi was created to provide a quick and easy way to plan your daily life. Habi contains several features to make this a reality for our users. 
 
 
Our features include: 
 
 1. Sleep Tracker: Enter the amount of sleep you receive and the app will provide an average amount of sleep you get. 
 
 2. Water tracker: Drink a glass of water and click the button to add a glass of water. This can allow you to stay on track of your water intake. 
 
 3. To-do list: A to do list is essential in planning tasks to complete. This can help manage your day to day life. 
 
 4. Grocery list: This can keep track of all the groceries to collect at your next grocery run! 

 5. Calendar app: Add events and view the events added!
Fill out the fields and scroll below to add and view events!
Click on add item to add an item and clear list to clear the list.
Select any of the buttons below to start tracking!
Select any of the buttons below to edit your settings!
Enter the number of hours you slept:
Click on add item to add an item and clear list to clear the list.
Click to add a glass of water:
Fill out the required fields and click sign up to create an account!
